subject: Issues with Aliexpress Order ID: 8201683689661240
description_text:
Hi,

I purchased the 3 pedal plus x set with haptics from you on AliExpress but
I'm having a problem with them. None of the pedal inputs are being
recognized by any program besides Simsonn Manager. I've tried using
different USB cables, plugging them into different outlets and usb ports,
and turning my computer on and off many times but nothing has helped. If
possible could the issue be with the control box I have (it's the newest
one with haptic support)?

Regards,

Marcus

conversations.body_text: Hi Marcus Chin,  Please provide a video so we can check the issue. You can also use the VKB tool to run a test for further diagnostics.Â
